entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -29.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
